Articles.Content:
Hey all, Just made up a few simple rockets for new players to get to grips with the game with,

Rocket One: MunOwl

Stats:

Simple to fly!

Rocket Two: Osprey one:Crew transfer Vehicle

Even simpler to fly

Can get to stations around two hundred km but will need refueling

No debris left in space!

Download Link: http://www./?bv2nvaa17xuoakp

Rocket Three: The Jovian explorer ( Experienced Pilots ONLY!)

My go to interplanetary design,

12000 ÃŽâ€V

Can return from duna and other low gravity worlds,

Can get to every body in the Kerbol system,

Important note, use hot-key 1 to disable gimball on outer mainsails during takeoff,

http://www./?pxqejacxzc5lppt

If these craft get good responses I will post more,

Brooksy
